front.title: Hero Of A Thousand Devices
front.gametext: Deploy on one of your droids. During your deploy phase, may use 1 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take one device that deploys on a droid into hand and reshuffle. Also, you may forfeit devices deployed on this droid (forfeit value = destiny number).
front.lore: Left to his own devices, Artoo used his spunk and creativity to save his companions' lives time and time again.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
